Utility with methods to handle time formatting

Static Methods

inline fullDateString(d : Date) : String

Method will make a string out of the given date object, formatted as: YearMonthDayHoursMinutesSeconds

inline secondsToTime(seconds : Int) : String

inline toDate(milliseconds : Float) : Date

Identical as Date.fromTime
